title.narrative: Output 1: National dialogues are structured between young people and government from each of the five G5 Sahel countries.

description.narrative: # of assessment reports on national policies in favour of young people which include key messages by the youth to their authorities.

title.narrative: Output 1: National dialogues are structured between young people and government from each of the five G5 Sahel countries.

description.narrative: # of assessment reports on national policies in favour of young people which include key messages by the youth to their authorities.

title.narrative: Sustainable and structured dialogue between youth in the G5 Sahel countries, their govs and the EU is established, and the messages of youth are taken into account at the EU-G5 Sahel Ministerial meeting in June and the EU-Africa Summit in Nov '17.

description.narrative: # qualitative contributions (messages, reports and thematic papers) by youth from the G5 Sahel countries, including the diaspora, to the regional and international high level meetings

title.narrative: Sustainable and structured dialogue between youth in the G5 Sahel countries, their govs and the EU is established, and the messages of youth are taken into account at the EU-G5 Sahel Ministerial meeting in June and the EU-Africa Summit in Nov '17.

description.narrative: # qualitative contributions (messages, reports and thematic papers) by youth from the G5 Sahel countries, including the diaspora, to the regional and international high level meetings

title.narrative: Output 2: A regional dialogue between the G5 Sahel and youth representatives is structured and includes preliminary discussions with youth from Europe, the Maghreb and the diaspora. Dialogue will focus on the dev. Of a G5 Sahel Youth Strategy

description.narrative: A dialogue is facilitated to develop a youth strategy

title.narrative: Output 2: A regional dialogue between the G5 Sahel and youth representatives is structured and includes preliminary discussions with youth from Europe, the Maghreb and the diaspora. Dialogue will focus on the dev. Of a G5 Sahel Youth Strategy

description.narrative: A dialogue is facilitated to develop a youth strategy

title.narrative: Output 3: Development of a G5 Sahel youth strategy

description.narrative: A final draft of the G5 Sahel Youth strategy to be endorsed and adopted on the Ministerial Meeting in June, including the confirmations of a political engagement from each G5 Sahel government to implement it as well as the political engagement from EU to support it

title.narrative: Output 3: Development of a G5 Sahel youth strategy

description.narrative: A final draft of the G5 Sahel Youth strategy to be endorsed and adopted on the Ministerial Meeting in June, including the confirmations of a political engagement from each G5 Sahel government to implement it as well as the political engagement from EU to support it
